name: ZombieBoy
description:
ESCAPE FROM THE ZOMBIE BOY'S HOUSE AS FAST AS YOU CAN!!!

IN THIS GAME YOU HAVE TO KILL THE ZOMBIE BOY TO GET THE DOOR KEY AND TO KILL THE ZOMBIE YOU HAVE TO GET THE SHOTGUN...THERE ARE 5 PARTS OF SHOTGUN THAT ARE HIDDEN IN THIS LUXURY HOUSE YOU HAVE TO FIND THAT PARTS AND THEN YOU WILL GET THE SHOTGUN...AFTER YOU KILL THE ZOMBIE BOY YOU HAVE TO FIND THE DOOR KEY UNDER 3 MINUTES AND AFTER THE 3 MINUTES THE ZOMBIE BOY WILL RESPAWN AND THE SHOTGUN WILL GET DISAPPEARED...SO FIND THE KEY UNDER 3 MINUTES OR YOU WILL NOT GET ANOTHER CHANCE TO FIND IT!!!
